item.description: origin author: Rikesh 寫個小玩具讀取從Ansible Web讀取資料, 希望有一天也能成為contributer #!/usr/bin/python3 import requests import json class Auto_ops: # attribute api_token = "" origin_url = "http://localhost:10445" headers = { 'Content-type': 'application/json', 'Accept': 'application/json', "Authorization": api_token } id_project = "" # Constructor def __init__(self, origin_url): self.api_token = self.set_conf() self.origin_url = origin_url def set_conf(self): # Opening JSON file file = open('configmap.json') # returns JSON object as a dictionary data = json.load(file) api_token = "Bearer" + " " + data["token"] self.
